title: Open Web Calendar
description: Embed a highly customizable web calendar into your website using ICal source links

items.title: Introducing CalDAV and Signing up to Events with Nextcloud
items.content_html:
For years now, the Open Web Calendar has served as a static display for your online calendar.
Due to to the funding we have received from NLNet, it can be an active part of your website: Sign up to events!

items.title: Social Media News
items.content_html: We have  several channels over which you can get to know the Open Web Calendar.

items.title: New Website & Funding
items.content_html:
As the Open Web Calendar is funded by NLNet,
it was also suggested to setup a website that shows how to use the calendar,
not only hosting the tool itself.
